translation.en: ♪ It's time to make some noise ♪
translation.fr: C'est l'heure de faire du bruit

translation.en: ♪ Feel the music, use our voice ♪
translation.fr: Et de donner de la voix

translation.en: ♪ The wheels on the bus go round and round All through the town ♪
translation.fr: Les roues du bus tournent en rond Dans toute la ville

translation.en: Hi, we're riding the bus to Music Time.
translation.fr: Coucou ! On va à la crèche musicale en bus.

translation.en: Max loves buses. Don't you, Max?
translation.fr: Max adore les bus. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: Higgledy-piggledy hound, it must be time for the secret sound.
translation.fr: Nom d'un mouton, vous entendez ce que j'entends ?

translation.en: [whispers] I love this part of music time.
It's a guessing game where we try to guess a secret sound.
translation.fr: Dans ce jeu, on doit deviner un son mystère.

translation.en: The only thing I like more than guessing sounds is making them. [mimics farting]
translation.fr: J'adore deviner les sons, mais surtout, en faire !

translation.en: Oh, you always bring the best secret sounds.
What have you got for us today?
[laughs] The right answer might be in there somewhere.
A hippo? What sound do they make?
translation.fr: Un hippopotame ? Ça fait quel son ?

translation.en: [chuckles] None of those sound the same to me.
Does anyone else have any idea what it is?
translation.fr: Qui d'autre sait ce que c'est ?

translation.en: Oh, we know that song. Don't we, Max?
translation.fr: On la connaît, pas vrai, Max ?

translation.en: Oh, oh, I like the part that goes…
♪ Up and down, up and down ♪
translation.fr: De haut en bas, de haut en bas

translation.en: The part that goes "swish, swish, swish," really shows off my dance moves.
translation.fr: Quand ça fait : "swish, swish", j'adore me trémousser !

translation.en: Okay, okay. This bus needs to make a pit stop
translation.fr: Ce bus doit faire une petite pause

translation.en: or we'll never make it onto the rainbow stage.
translation.fr: si nous voulons arriver jusqu'à la scène arc-en-ciel.

translation.en: I think it's time I taught you all how to rest.
translation.fr: Il est temps de vous apprendre à faire une pause.

translation.en: I already know how to do that.
[chuckling] Oh, that is one kind of rest, Ahan.
translation.fr: C'est une sorte de pause, Ahan.

translation.en: And I… I do enjoy a good nap.
But in music, a rest means stop,
translation.fr: Mais en musique, faire une pause signifie s'arrêter

translation.en: until it's your turn to go again.
And I know a game we can play to show you just what I mean.
translation.fr: Je connais un jeu qui vous apprendra à le faire.

translation.en: I love it when Timberly does that.
For this game, Twinkle will be our musical traffic light.
translation.fr: Petite Étoile sera notre feu de circulation.

translation.en: When Twinkle turns green, we all get to go and sing.
translation.fr: Quand elle devient verte, chantons tous.

translation.en: we get to stop and rest.
[Timberly] ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪ ♪ Round and round… ♪
translation.fr: Les roues du bus tournent en rond Tournent en rond

translation.en: Good resting. Now, keep watching Twinkle and…
translation.fr: Jolie pause ! Regardez bien Petite Étoile, et allez-y !
Regardez bien Petite Étoile, et allez-y !

translation.en: ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪ ♪ Round and round… ♪
translation.fr: Les roues du bus tournent en rond Tournent en rond

translation.en: Some rests are longer than others.
[chuckles] Maybe we held that rest a little too long.
But I think they got the point.
A rest means stop, until it's your time to go.
translation.fr: Il faut s'arrêter et attendre son tour.

translation.en: we all get our chance to shine.
When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow, we know where it's time to go.
translation.fr: Quand Petite Étoile devient arc-en-ciel, c'est l'heure de chanter sur…

translation.en: [all] ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.fr: Les roues du bus tournent en rond

translation.en: ♪ Round and round, round and round ♪
♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.fr: Les roues du bus tournent en rond

translation.en: ♪ The wipers on the bus Go swishy-swish-swish ♪
♪ The wipers on the bus Go swishy-swish-swish ♪
♪ The people on the bus go up and down ♪
♪ Up and down, up and down ♪
♪ The people on the bus go up and down ♪ ♪ All through the town ♪
translation.fr: Les passagers montent et descendent Dans toute la ville

translation.en: ♪ The horn on the bus Goes beep, beep, beep ♪
translation.fr: Le klaxon du bus fait bip, bip, bip

translation.en: ♪ Beep, beep, beep ♪ ♪ Beep, beep, beep ♪
translation.fr: Bip, bip, bip Bip, bip, bip

translation.en: ♪ The horn on the bus goes Beep, beep, beep ♪
translation.fr: Le klaxon du bus fait bip, bip, bip

translation.en: ♪ Beep, beep, beep, beep Beep, beep, beep ♪
[all] ♪ The singers on the bus Go la, la, la ♪ ♪ La, la, la ♪
translation.fr: Les chanteurs dans le bus Font la, la, la

translation.en: ♪ The singers on the bus go la, la, la ♪
translation.fr: Les chanteurs dans le bus Font la, la, la

translation.en: ♪ Singing together is so much fun ♪
♪ So much fun, so much fun ♪
♪ Singing together is so much fun
Not really. My name is Ahan,
translation.fr: C'est faux. Je m'appelle Ahan et j'adore chanter.
Je m'appelle Ahan et j'adore chanter.

translation.en: Ahan, doesn't that song have a quieter part?
translation.fr: Il y a un passage calme dans cette chanson.

translation.en: Yes, Papa, but my favorite is the loud part.
translation.fr: Oui, papa, mais je préfère la partie bruyante.

translation.en: Today we're going to learn about--
These mushroom stools make a loud sound when you sit on them.
translation.fr: Ces tabourets font un drôle de bruit.
C'est vrai qu'ils font du bruit !

translation.en: [laughing] I know, Maple. Loud and so funny.
translation.fr: Je sais, Noisette. C'est trop rigolo !

translation.en: Who doesn't love a good, loud, floofy sound?
translation.fr: Tout le monde aime ces sons rigolos.

translation.en: But there are some times we shouldn't be loud.
translation.fr: Mais parfois, il faut être discret.

translation.en: Like when you need to listen for something important.
translation.fr: Quand il faut écouter quelque chose d'important.

translation.en: It's time for the secret sound.
Here comes Tootson. He's always nice and loud.
translation.fr: Voici Tchou-T'son. Il adore faire du bruit.

translation.en: What sound have you got for us today?
-I don't know it. It's strange. -[Mia] What is that?
Max says that's the sound our dad makes when he blows his nose.
translation.fr: Max dit que c'est le bruit de papa qui se mouche.

translation.en: That's a very good guess, Max,
but I don't think that's what Tootson had in mind.
translation.fr: mais je ne crois pas que ce soit ça.

translation.en: Twinkle, could you show us some guesses?
-A bee? -A bee buzzing around a flower.
translation.fr: - Une abeille ? - Oui, autour d'une fleur !

translation.en: But I have one more hint.
It's a musical instrument that anyone can play.
translation.fr: C'est un instrument de musique dont on peut tous jouer.

translation.en: Do you know what it is?
Ooh, let's find out if you're right.
Are you sure that's an instrument?
[Ahan] Cool. And today we all get to play them.
translation.fr: Et aujourd'hui, on va tous en jouer !

translation.en: You just hum into it really loudly.
translation.fr: Il n'y a qu'à fredonner très fort dedans.

translation.en: Now, to play the whole song,
it takes just a bit more effort and some practice.
translation.fr: il faut un peu plus d'efforts et de pratique.

translation.en: Almost any instrument can be played loudly or softly.
translation.fr: Presque tous les instruments peuvent être discrets ou bruyants.

translation.en: But wouldn't music be boring if it only came out one way?
translation.fr: La musique serait ennuyeuse si elle ne changeait jamais.

translation.en: Think of it like this. How does loud music make you feel?
translation.fr: Quel effet te fait la musique bruyante ?

translation.en: Excited like I'm the leader of my own parade.
translation.fr: J'adore ça ! Comme si je menais ma propre parade !

translation.en: That's a great way to show how loud music can make you feel.
translation.fr: C'est une belle façon de montrer l'effet de la musique bruyante.

translation.en: Soft music can help us feel cozy
translation.fr: La musique douce a un effet réconfortant

translation.en: Look, I think Max is sleepy.
Do you need a nap, Max?
When it's nap time at home, our mum sings to us very softly.
translation.fr: Quand on fait la sieste, maman chante une chanson douce.

translation.en: Maybe we should sing softly now.
I don't know any soft songs.
You can sing any song softly.
♪ Whenever I go out They whisper all about ♪
translation.fr: Quand je sors Ils chuchotent tous
Ça a marché. J'ai compris. Eh oui !

translation.en: But when you really want to let loose and have some fun,
translation.fr: Mais quand on veut se défouler et s'amuser,

translation.en: You know what that means. When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow, we know where it's time to go.
translation.fr: Quand Petite Étoile devient arc-en-ciel, c'est l'heure de chanter…

translation.en: ♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.fr: Quand on sort Les gens crient fort

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪ ♪ Na-na, na-na, na-na, na-na ♪
♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.fr: Quand je sors Les gens crient fort

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.fr: Quand on sort Les gens crient fort

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.fr: Quand on sort Les gens crient fort

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
I'm not Maple. I'm a little kitten, Mummy.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas Noisette, je suis un chaton.

translation.en: [softly] I'm pretending to be a kitten.
translation.fr: Je fais semblant d'être un chaton.
Toi, tu joues à faire semblant ?

translation.en: [laughing] Come on, little kitten. Off we go.
I'm still pretending. Do you want to be a kitten with me?
translation.fr: Je fais toujours semblant. Tu veux être un chaton avec moi ?

translation.en: -I want to be a kitten. -Me too.
translation.fr: Je veux être un chaton ! Moi aussi ! Vas-y, Max. Miaou !

translation.en: It must be time for today's secret sound.
Can kittens play the secret sound game?

translation.fr: Quel est le son du jour ?

translation.en: I think I know what it is.
-Timberly, can we see our choices, please? -Absolutely.
translation.fr: Timbelly, peut-on voir les réponses ? Bien sûr ! Petite Étoile ?

translation.en: Hmm. Do you think it might be a cow?
And it can't be a dog because they go, "Woof-woof."
So that leaves us with one last picture.
translation.fr: Ça nous laisse une dernière image.

translation.en: Does anyone know what it is?
Meow. It's a kitten like me.
translation.fr: Miaou ! C'est un chaton comme moi !

translation.en: And I've got just the song for us today.
translation.fr: Et j'ai justement la chanson qu'il nous faut.

translation.en: Four pairs of little kitten mittens
Now, we'll need these for today's song,
translation.fr: Il nous les faut pour notre chanson :

translation.en: And I'm going to be Mummy cat.
Because, on the rainbow stage today,
you're going to sing as the kitten choir. [laughs]
translation.fr: vous serez une chorale de chatons.

translation.en: I know what a kitten is, but what's a choir?
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'est un chaton mais pas une chorale.

translation.en: Oh, a choir is a group who sing together.
translation.fr: C'est un groupe qui chante ensemble.

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens In fluffy little mittens ♪
translation.fr: Mes quatre chatons Avec des moufles

translation.en: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We love our mittens ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On adore nos moufles

translation.en: It's too hot to dance and wear mittens.
I'll put them down here while we practice.
The kitten choir sounds so wonderful.
Oh, I can't wait to sing on the rainbow stage later and show off our kitten mittens.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de chanter sur scène et de montrer nos moufles !

translation.en: Hey, what happened to your mittens, Maple?
They were right there, but now they're not.
translation.fr: Elles étaient là, elles ont disparu !

translation.en: Don't worry, Maple. We'll help you find your mittens.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas, on va t'aider à les trouver.
On est la chorale des chatons.

translation.en: Working together is what choirs do.
translation.fr: On doit se serrer les coudes.

translation.en: It's what best friends do, too.
translation.fr: C'est ce que font les amis.

translation.en: Come on, everyone. Help us find Maple's kitten mittens.
translation.fr: Cherchons les moufles de Noisette tous ensemble.
Max, tu as trouvé quelque chose ?

translation.en: Has anyone found them? Where could they be?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un les a trouvées ? Où sont-elles ?

translation.en: Can you see my mittens anywhere?
translation.fr: Et toi, tu as vu mes moufles ?

translation.en: I must have sat on them by mistake.
translation.fr: J'ai dû m'asseoir dessus par mégarde !

translation.en: Thanks for helping me find my mittens, everybody.
translation.fr: Merci de m'avoir aidée à les retrouver.

translation.en: When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow, we know where it's time to go.
translation.fr: Quand Petite Étoile devient arc-en-ciel, il est l'heure de chanter…

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
[children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We lost our mittens ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a perdu nos moufles

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your mittens ♪
translation.fr: Mes quatre chatons Trouvons vos moufles

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we found our mittens ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a trouvé nos moufles

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we lost our toys ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a perdu nos jouets

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your toys ♪
translation.fr: Mes quatre chatons Trouvons vos jouets

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we found our toys ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a trouvé nos jouets

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we lost our treats ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a perdu nos friandises

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your treats ♪
translation.fr: Mes quatre chatons Trouvons vos friandises

translation.en: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We found our treats ♪
translation.fr: Maman chérie On a trouvé nos friandises
